events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience and skills.
A recruiter specializing in technical roles has been assigned to assist you throughout the application process.
We completed an initial screening call to discuss your background and confirm your interest in the Software Engineer role.
Thank you for the update, I am excited about the opportunity and available for the next steps in the interview process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 10 AM UTC to assess your software engineering skills.
The technical interview was successfully completed; the interviewers were impressed with your problem-solving abilities.
Following the technical round, your HR interview has been scheduled for May 10th to discuss company culture and benefits.
You completed the HR interview successfully, and the team is happy with your alignment to our company values.
We have sent you a formal job offer for the Software Engineer position, including salary and benefits details.
